0:00 Intro 0:13 Apps Script Vertex AI advanced service: https://goo.gle/4bFm9iy 0:43 Convert interactive event-driven Chat apps to Workspace add-ons: https://goo.gle/4bpJuF5 1:18 Granular OAuth consent in Google Chat apps: https://goo.gle/4acu1WD 1:45 Apps Script’s AddOnsResponseService available for Chat apps: https://goo.gle/3Ni9yaY 2:01 Update to samples gallery: https://goo.gl
